NEW YORK STATE EDUCATIONAL RADIO AND TELEVISION ASSOCIATION
Radio-Television Center Syracuse University
Syracuse 10, New York
MEMORANDUM
To: Members of NYSERTA April 23, 1963
As an individual member of N.Y.SÂ»E.R.T.A, you will be
interested in knowing that the fiscal year for N.Y.S.E.R.T.A. has
been agreed to by the Executive Committee as running from June
to June.
Although we were not fortunate enough to see you at the
recent N.Y.S.E.R.T.A. meeting at the Syracuse Country House,
we presumed your continuing interest in the organization and
for that reason we enclose a membership blank for the current
year.
All of us in the organization sense a renewed vigor and
purpose, and we will look forward to your continued support.
Very sincerely,
Ruane B. Hill, Chairman
Membership Committee
RBH:sc
Enclosures
